attributes.action: Say no to development of Melton Feilds North Ferriby!
attributes.additional_details: St Modwen's propose to build 600 homes plus industrial units on Melton Fields which at the moment is farm land!,we who sign this petition would like the Government to put a STOP to this! as it would put great strain on the area!.Apart from Schools having to take more pupils,more policing,fire,and ambulance services would be needed!more traffic would be created and we would lose our rural setting!!.So now lets see if we really do live in a democracy! have your say and please sign!!
